sentences.en: A person's psychology is a subtle thing . How true it is that words are echoes of the heart.
sentences.cn: 人的心理真是奇妙,言为心声一点不假.

sentences.en: Abraham Maslow described psychology as "the science of being."
sentences.cn: 亚伯拉罕·马斯洛形容心理学是“存在的科学”。

sentences.en: an expert in child psychology
sentences.cn: 儿童心理学家

sentences.en: Chomsky's review is entitled "Psychology and Ideology".
sentences.cn: 乔姆斯基的这篇评论题为《心理学与意识形态》。

sentences.en: experts in the field of developmental psychology
sentences.cn: 发展心理学领域的专家

sentences.en: Folk psychology comes closer to the obvious truth than the most sophisticated theories.
sentences.cn: 比起最复杂的理论，大众心理学更接近那些显而易见的事实。

sentences.en: Her major field of study was psychology.
sentences.cn: 她研究的领域是心理学.

sentences.en: His speciality was psychology -- one important branch on the great tree of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 他的专业是心理学，这是知识之树上的一个重要分枝。

sentences.en: I can't understand that man's psychology.
sentences.cn: 我无法理解那个人的心理。

sentences.en: I majored in psychology at Hunter College.
sentences.cn: 在亨特学院求学时，我主修心理学。

sentences.en: I teach psychology by way of a range of traditional lectures, practicals and tutorials.
sentences.cn: 我采用传统授课与实践和指导相结合的方式教授心理学。

sentences.en: I understood the psychology of this, but it still hurt.
sentences.cn: 我理解这种心理，但这仍然让我感到伤心。

sentences.en: It was not until the mid-twentieth century that psychology really came into its own.
sentences.cn: 直到20世纪中叶心理学才得到应有的重视。

sentences.en: research into the psychology of racism
sentences.cn: 对种族歧视心理的研究

sentences.en: She has a background in child psychology.
sentences.cn: 她受过儿童心理学的教育.

sentences.en: She's a specialist in canine psychology and behaviour.
sentences.cn: 她是狗心理和行为专家.

sentences.en: That may be two-bit psychology, but it's the only explanation I have.
sentences.cn: 那可能是不值一提的心理，但它却是我唯一的解释。

sentences.en: the psychology of three-year-olds
sentences.cn: 三岁孩子的思想

sentences.en: The resultant material was to be pored over by experts in psychology.
sentences.cn: 这样的一份材料要由心理学专家精心研究.

sentences.en: The study of psychology has recently been widely cross-fertilized by new discoveries in genetics.
sentences.cn: 心理学研究最近从遗传学的新发现中受益匪浅。

sentences.en: Thus superstition thrives, side - by - side with modern medical science, psychology, and religion.
sentences.cn: 由此可见,迷信与现代医学 、 心理学和宗教一起兴旺地发展着.

words.tran_cn: 心理的；心理学的；精神上的
[心理] 心理发生；精神发生
心理测验；心理测定学；心灵占卜术

phrases.tran_cn: 消费者心理学；顾客心理学
进化心理学；演化心理學
格式塔心理学；完形心理学
管理心理学；经营心理学
人格心理学；个性心理学

trans.tran_en: the study of the mind and how it influences people’s behaviour
